title: Added ability to configure settings for RocksDB infoLogLevel, keepLog…
Add REST endpoint under /ws/v1/samza at tracking url
body:
The Samza AM REST endpoint is currently not available from the RM REST api.  This may be a bug with the RM, but note that:

a) this is not the way the MapReduce AM exposes it's REST endpoint
b) the Samza REST endpoint is currently unversioned (also unlike the RM and MapReduce REST endpoints)
c) the Samza REST endpoint is not using the RM proxy mechanism for security.

title: SAMZA-41 changes with doc updates
body:
As per my conversation with Yi Pan, I have attached the patch for SAMZA-41 built and tested against 0.9.1 branch, along with updated docs and unit tests. 

The changes are pretty non-intrusive, and I am hoping this makes it into the 0.9.1 release.

Here is the review board link ([~nickpan47] I have added you as a reviewer. Please feel free to add others):
https://reviews.apache.org/r/35809/

I can send a separate pull request for master later on.
